alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 5:31PM EST until January 03 at 6:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... North central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Western Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EST/530 PM CST/. * At 531 PM EST/431 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dothan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Headland, Dothan, Blakely, Kinsey, Cowarts, Edison, Arlington, Webb, Columbia, Newville, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Shorterville, Parksville, Hayes, Watson Crossroads and Pecan. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...and southwestern Georgia.
